thread.title: Liz Crawford Takes On Greg Hardy

title: Liz Crawford Takes On Greg Hardy
text:
Liz Crawford Takes On Greg Hardy "Dear Greg, You can stay a Cowboy. We'll see you Thanksgiving. Love, The Panthers" Post to Facebook Liz Crawford Takes On Greg Hardy "Dear Greg, You can stay a Cowboy. We'll see you Thanksgiving. Love, The Panthers"  //on.wfmy.com/1RyaboX   Join the Conversation To   Liz Crawford Takes On Greg Hardy WFMY News 2 12:43 p.m. EDT October 9, 2015 Aug 29, 2015; Arlington, TX, USA; Dallas Cowboys defensive end Greg Hardy (76) on the sidelines during the game against the Minnesota Vikings at AT&T Stadium. Mandatory Credit: Matthew Emmons-USA TODAY Sports ORG XMIT: USATSI-225034 ORIG FILE ID: 20150829_mje_se2_390.jpg (Photo: Matthew Emmons, Matthew Emmons-USA TODAY Sports) 1 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Like many sports journalists, WFMY News 2 Sports Anchor Liz Crawford reported on Greg Hardy's return to the football field. The former Carolina Panther will make his debut as a Dallas Cowboy this Sunday. 
You might expect an apology or ounce of humility from Hardy but when asked many questions from the media, Hardy's responses left a bad taste in many mouths, including Liz Crawford. 
Liz ended her segment with, "Dear Greg, You can stay a Cowboy. We'll see you Thanksgiving. Love, The Panthers"
